 Malware / BlackCat / ALPHV3 /

## readme.txt


-----

```
alphv3_dec.py  Decrypting internal data

alphv3_m2_hash.py - Implementation of custom hash
algorithms (ALPHV3 morph2)

alphv3_m2_util.py - Utils (ALPHV3 morph2)

alphv3_m2_dec_cfg.py - Decrypting configuration data
(ALPHV3 morph2)

alphv3_m2_extract_cfg_key.py - Extracting configuration encryption
key from command line (ALPHV3 morph2)

alphv3_m2_access_key.py  - Implementation of access-key
(ALPHV3 morph2)

example_cfg_key.bin - Configuration encryption key
example (ALPHV3 morph2)

example_cmd_lines.txt - Command line examples (ALPHV3
morph2)

example_privkey.bin - RSA private key example

example_pubkey.bin - RSA public key example

example_access_key.txt  - access-key example

example_access_token.txt - access-token example

```

-----
references: https://papers.vx-underground.org/papers/Malware Defense/Malware Analysis 2023/2023-03-21 - BlackCat v3 Decryptor Scripts.pdf
